publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-191.2 Miss Annabel Goldie: Modernising Justiceâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-191) in the name of Cathy Jamieson, leave out from "supporting" to end and insert "and, while welcoming proposals to make more efficient the processing and disposal of criminal cases, expresses concern at the proposed extension to the 110 day rule, the resources implication for sheriff courts of handling an increased workload and the continuing inadequacy of resources available to the police and the Crown Office and Procurator Fiscal Service."
